page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JULIE
page.content: I am 11 years old.I live with my sister who is 10 and my step brother who is older than me,because my Mam has just remarried.I have never had a brother before and I have lived with my grandparents for a long time.My Mam has been trying to get us a Council house so we can all live together again. We used to live in Hebburn with my real Dad but he left us when my sister was a tiny baby. My Mam and new Dad are retraining for a different job as manager and manageress of a pub for Vaux. I'll be glad when she starts her new job properly, because I don't see her very much at the moment as she travels to a different place of work each week. I'm going to the Comprehensive School next year.I hope that we are all living together by then.
